description: Translates Ultimate Fantastic Four #50-57.
name: Fantastic Four 9: Cubo Cósmico

description: Translates Ultimate Fantastic Four #58-60, Ultimate Fantastic Four/X-Men Annual #1, Ultimate X-Men/Ultimate Fantastic Four Annual #1 & Ultimate Fantastic Four Requiem.
name: Fantastic Four 10: Ultimatum

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

name: The Ultimates 8: La República Está Ardiendo
The Ultimates 9: Dos Ciudades, Dos Mundos
The Ultimates 10: Divididos Caemos, Unidos Resistimos

description:
Life for Souichiro Hino and Itsuki Aoyama and their Love Club aka Ghostbusters should be getting easier. The club finally have a teacher adviser who won't run screaming into the night. They've even managed to attract girls who aren't spirits to their ranks. However, fate and Souko Hino, Souichiro's mother, have other plans.

Souko chooses not to warn them when they take on a video game that is a portal to hell. She even farms them out to sold a haunting of a historic mansion. Meanwhile, those portals at Seika Academy keep popping up ready to suck unsuspecting students inside to be eaten by demons. And then, there is the talking mouse with magical powers! Will the adventures ever end so they can have a normal school day?

Chapter Eight - Ten & Special Teardrop.
name: Vol. 3

description:
Souichiro Hino and Itsuki Aoyama finally have a handle on solving the mysteries plaguing Seika Academy. Their Love Club aka "Ghostbusters" has members with all kinds of skills to use against the spirits and demons that try to make their home at the school. But then Souichiro begins having strange dreams about a young girl who keeps trying to warn him of impending doom. The next thing he knows, Souichiro is being transferred to a new Academy where there is another Love Club that needs his and Itsuki's help. And what does this sudden transfer have to do with the Dragon Blade once owned by his father? All this plus volcanoes, earthquakes and elder demons no one should awaken...

Chapter Eleven - Thirteen & Scramble Night.
name: Vol. 4

description:
HE IS THE ORACLE AND HE TELLS US OF THE REVENGE OF 5 MORTALS AGAINST THE GODS OF OLYMPIA

He is the king of the smallest kingdom of Greece.

He can't compete in the art of war. But there are other arts.

As a youth, the king was a great sculptor before his talent gave way to his duty towards his people.

Zeus is going to test him... He will make this tiny kingdom a haven of peace on condition that the little king manages to affect him.
name: Le Petit Roi

description:
THE MOST STARTLING REVENGE UPON APOLLO...

Yesterday, he was handsome and admired by all; today he is hideous, hunchbacked and skinny. He owes his fall to Apollo who, jealous of his success with women and in particular Aphrodite, deformed him. He is now repelled and laughed at. But if he can't conquer the sublime goddess through his looks, he will seduce her with his talents as a cook.
name: Le Malformé

description:
He is the oracle and he tells us of the revenge of 5 mortals against the gods of olympia

Zeus cannot resist the charms of mortal women and his wife, Hera, is very jealous. In the Kingdom of Argos, a young woman confides to Cydippe that she is the mistress of the King of the Gods. Zeus learns about this

and orders Poseidon to drown the city along with his secret. Cydippe’s husband and their children are among the many victims.

Mad with sorrow, Cydippe calls upon Zeus and gives him an ultimatum: either he helps her to bring her family back from Hell or she will tell all to Hera.

Reluctantly, he gives her three magical artefacts: a cape of invisibility, a piece of chalk to go through walls and a bronze sword in the shape of a thunderbolt that can provoke lightening.

But every time she uses one of them, she will be indebted to him.

Cydippe doesn’t care, only one thing matters: to save her family.
name: La Veuve

description:
Sisyphus is the man the Gods hate most of all… and he rises up against Zeus and Olympus.

For his repeated offenses against Zeus, Sisyphus has been condemned to eternally roll up a slope a rock which always rolls back down before he reaches the summit. But even imprisoned in Tartarus, he is planning his

revenge. He will find in Hell the allies needed to return to the Living and to start a new War of the Titans.
name: Le Supplicié

description:
THE NEW ADVENTURES OF THE ORPHANED PRINCESS IN COLONIAL INDIA.

Sara Crewe continues to hide her identitiy so that she can work in the automaton factory which used to belong to her father. But Sara does not yet know that Lavinia Herbert has just arrived in Pondichery. Lavinia would be delighted to revenge herself on her holdest enemy...
name: Le Retour de Lavinia

description:
When lifelong enemies decide to become allies, the whole town is turned upside-down! Romance, thrills and spills and humour.

Sara Crewe faces a great challenge! She must help Lavinia, her notorious enemy, to flee from her wedding. Sara is on all the battle fronts at the same time and a false rumour endangers the famous factory! She doesn’t have the time to look after James. However, a grateful Lavinia finds the young man very much to her taste!
name: Meilleurs voeux de mariage

description:
The Book Of Air Raid Robertson

Everyone's favorite quixotic aviator is back for a second trio of comics stories. Air Raid Robertson is ever ready to live up to his (self-proclaimed) reputation for dauntless heroism. Ridley, his long-suffering sidekick, is ever ready to watch his partner's back and (horribly fail to) reign in his excesses.

This e-book contains three stories...

"Straight, No Chaser" - Air Raid Robertson forces his way into becoming the third wheel for Ridley's date at the local jazz club. Unfortunately, things only get more awkward when the star soloist turns out to have a hypnotic horn and larcenous intentions.

"Big Lizard In My Backyard" - The city is under attack from an atomic dinosaur. Yes, again. No, I don't think the atomic dinosaurs are going to stop coming. You should probably consider moving to another place if this bothers you so much. But hey, Air Raid Robertson and Ridley are taking care of it.

"The Bats Have Left The Belltower" - Suspicious of Air Raid Robertson's competence, his commanding officer sends him off to secure the purchase of a historic castle. That sort of thing should be a milk run, but nobody anticipated that the castle's owner would be somewhat undead.
name: Straight, No Chaser; Big Lizard In My Backyard; The Bats Have Left The Belltower

description:
76-Pages of Astounding Action-Packed Arachnid-Adventure!

Spider-Verse continues!

As Spider-Man gathers the spider-army, the Inheritors attack, forcing Silk, Spider-Woman and Spidey 2099 to flee!

By Dan Slott, Olivier Coipel, Dennis Hopeless, Greg Land, Peter David and Will Sliney!

Includes material reprinted from Amazing Spider-Man Vol.4 #10, Spider-Woman #1 and Spider-Man 2099 #6!

A Free World...

Over seven years have passed since the collapse of the Tamiran Empire. Starting from the ground up, Xiltria is becoming a decent world once again. Government. Structures. Law and Order. Everything is slowly shaping into ideals that the people could only dream about. The Nation of Brosha has become a prosperous country. With an abundance of culture, resources and faith, they continue to push forward.

However, threats from the Dark Legion continue to emerge throughout the corners of the world. Within the Nation of Brosha stands the city of Montaru. A foundation for establishing worldly order. A place where everyone comes together, in hopes of protecting the innocent and stomping out any threats against Xiltria.

Thanks to the help of Sekken and Iyo, the citizens of Pegil can continue to live peacefully again. Though there may be hardships, they at least have the opportunity to overcome them. Heading back to Brosha, Sekken and Iyo meet up with their guild, Emerald Moon.

Reunions are cut short as a new crisis emerges that has the means to threaten the entire world. With little time to spare, they depart for Preminx...in hopes of heading off the Dark Legion. With Emerald Moon standing between two armies, it is their hope the Region of Preminx will not be soaked in blood.

Avaiyo: Myriad Law

Preminx Part I

Chapters 029 - 042
name: Volume 03

description: When a gang of armed thugs attack Wayne Industries, it's up to Tim Drake, aka Robin, to protect his students. But it's three on one, and Robin is unarmed…does he stand a chance without Batman's help?
name: The Apprentice Part 2 of 2

description: "Perspectives". Detective Drekker is getting increasing pressure to close the 'Throne of God' case. Unable to do so, with good conscience, he tracks down several leads, including a couple survivors of The Boogeyman. Paulette hangs a lantern for another and Drekker questions the author regarding the anonymous letter. Is there something supernatural connecting the two cases? And what is the Zero moment that is creeping so near? Boy Zero is an epic noir spanning decades and two separate murder mysteries. The cases are somehow connected and Detective Drekker must connect them before the killings begin again.
name: Perspectives

description:
Such a Nice Neighborhood

Determined to bring justice to the city of Baltimore, Marty Jones continues her quest to purge the city of criminals the police can't or won't handle. However, the gruesome experience her and her fellow officers went through, continues to take its toll.

This is the third issue in a story about how, even in dire circumstances, character can be built, and relationships created.
name: Such a Nice Neighborhood

description: Mrs. Claus learns about Jezebel's jaded attitude and assigns her to work the mall on Christmas Eve with none other than Santa Claus himself, hoping the old elf can rekindle Jezebel's true spirit of Christmas. Jack and Cynthia's plan to hijack the powersled they saw on the mall roof hits a snare when Jack gets grounded for fighting with his brother, Noel. And no one sees what's coming when a prehistoric creature released from its prison of ice finds its way into the North Pole.

The Man in the Mist

Fresh off saving the vivacious canary, Vivian Remington Busch, our heroes, Colt Buckshot and Jackson Dupagne, DOUBLE BARREL, are on the prowl, playing rats and mice and slamming eel juice with degenerates and chippies! But you can only play on someone else's dime for so long before a bill comes due as Colt and Jackson are about to discover...
name: The Man in the Mist

description: Kain tells Zandalee that he is a demon hunter and gives her an abridged explanation of Demon Hunter history. The next day Zandalee is followed by another spirit and seeks out Kain's help.

When a strange force flings the TARDIS into our universe, the Doctor encounters a 12-year-old girl who happens to be a huge fan of the Doctor Who television show. The Doctor must then grapple with being a fictional character, along with monsters lurking in the girl’s school, on the way to coming face-to-face with the actor who portrays him, Matt Smith. Written by Doctor Who TV writer Paul Cornell and artist Jimmy Broxton to celebrate the 50th anniversary of Doctor Who.
name: The Girl Who Loved Doctor Who

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Eleventh Doctor Archives

description:
Thirty-Three's a Crowd

It's the thrilling conclusion to The Big Hunt - a storyline that started in the Aug. 2014 issue of Evil Inc Monthly. Two heroes and two villains must escape a deadly world in which they are hunted as exotic game.

Plus: A special Tales from the Evil Inc Archive collects the best Christmas moments from the past.
name: The Big Hunt Conclusion: Thirty-Three's a Crowd

description: John L. Sullivan is fully on board with the plan to fight for Mrex. His 1st fight is very soon and he begins his training with Buque, but his headstrong ways cause a rift between the two. John L. meets Dawk, his space alien doctor and cutman. After a rough patch, he manages to impress during the training exercises. Mrex and Buque discuss his chances in private and Mrex shows Buque who is the boss and that HE is calling the shots.

volume.name: John L. Sullivan Boston Strong Boy In Space

description: CIA Special Agent Bob comes face-to-face with Fidel Castro! Will he be able finally rid the CIA of their most wanted kill target? While back home, the mad scientist, Dr. Gottlieb encounters trouble with the lab equipment that was used to brainwash Special Agent Bob and conduct other CIA sanctioned mind-altering experiments.

Bearing Arms

Last issue Lloyd and Bear crashed landed on a moon occupied by the evil Shoal!

Worse than that it turns out that the Shoal are using captured Burians (Bear's people, right?) to mine the moon!

Even worse that that (and you just know that's a lot worse!) our heroes have been captured! Oh no's!!!!!
name: Bearing Arms

description: Back with the FBI for barely a day and already Kim is revealing secrets she'd meant to keep hidden. But there's no time to stop and reconsider -- a new witness brings new clues. In this issue: Kim faces off with a killer!

Music-obsessed teens struggle through the rise and Fall of Generation X and the Alternative Rock era of the 1990s. They learn that the bonds of friendship they thought were unbreakable have already begun to crack, and the music they thought they'd love forever has already started to fade.

OH MY PIZZA!

Those stuffed magical pups are back for more madness and mayhem with their owners, Anise and Kana! Join the LOL pups on their latest adventures as they learn how to play rock-paper-scissors, perform magic, venture into the "botcha machine," destroy a school project, and make home-made peanut butter!

Included are two all new nemu*nemu stories: "Where's Dino Pony?" and "Collector Maniac" and extensive commentary and special artwork by the creators
name: Vol. 2: Smiles To Go!

description:
Fear the Beast

Without knowing where he is or how he got there, Thomas Simmons wakes up underneath some rubble, severely burned and in pain. As he stumbles onto a parking lot, he witnesses a fierce battle between two heavily armed people and a towering beast. While watching the fight an urge to help them grows inside him. Joining the battle, he suddenly finds himself with immense strength and speed. But all his power was no match for the beast who took ahold of the young woman and ripped her entire left arm straight off...
name: Fear the Beast

description:
The Verdict is Vengeance!

Nightwasp has finally brought the Hen to justice only to see his feathery foe freed on a technicality... a technicality which also frees every baddie he's ever put behind bars! Then, to win Buffy over, Nightwasp reveals his secret identity, only to have her threaten to report Ward Woodcock to the authorities. When Buffy's kidnapped by the Hen, he has to decide whether to save her or his super hero career! If that's not enough to get you clicking "download" there's a shock ending which could fry your electronic reading device!
name: The Verdict is Vengeance!

volume.name: Nightwasp: The Man Who Is Hardly Ever Afraid

description:
Strays

The villains have divided the heroes and the children are facing school and bullies. Dad gets to be the glue again.
name: Strays

description: Queen Venetia finds herself in Novosibirsk, Russia searching for her son. Aarush has been transported into another universe and Mikhal struggles with his mind powers on earth.

Tribulation

Adam, Michael's psychiatrist, is haunted by flashbacks of his failures revealing that he is not the man he appears to be.
name: Tribulation

description:
Skirmish in the Swamp

In the second issue of Swamp Tales, the animals get a visit from the annoying wilderness man "Wade Irksome" who visits the Bogg Swamp to study the wildlife for his new documentary series. Also in this issue Warty the frog decides to resurrect his super hero persona the "Caped Wart" and his delusions reach new levels of insanity. This issue also features 2 classic comic cover homages.
name: Book 2: Skirmish in the Swamp

description:
Teach English in Japan is a collaborative webcomic by Jeff Ellis and Jonathon Dalton. The story is based on Jeff and Jonathon's experiences teaching English in a foreign country. Jeff taught in the city of Kofu, Japan for two and a half years. Jonathon taught in Myauli and Taoyuan, Taiwan for a year and a half. They work collaboratively on the scripts, and Jeff creates the finished art. It is their hope that this comic will give an accurate depiction of the trials and tribulations of living and working in a different culture.

This story takes place in the year 2004 and is set to cover one year of life abroad for James K and James F.
name: Volume 2

description: The end is near. Alliances crumble. And death comes knocking...

Gold for Waha!

It’s been one year and one day since Dame Hatÿfe disappeared in Eckmül.

Her will is therefore opened and the Solicitor is surprised to learn that she had a daughter with the Venerable Rysta Fuquatou. But the child was brought up by the Trolls.

Two young clerks are sent to the village of Phalompe to bring back to Eckmül the heiress to the house once held by Dame Hatÿfe: Waha.

But it is not the right moment to reveal Rysta’s paternity. The election of the Venerables of Eckmül is beginning and his paternity could create a scandal and destabilize him.

A new album of the Trolls which reveals the secrets of politics in Eckmül and shows us a new facet of Waha’s personality!
name: L'Héritage de Waha

description:
The Magic Helpers

Mister Solenoid and Vivian Von Valiant find themselves in over their heads at the north pole when a group of alien skeletons set out to harvest the power of fictional polar bears. Later, Vivian and her brother contend with a wish-granting techno-genie while Mister Solenoid discovers America's strangest secrets at Area 56.
name: Chapter 2: The Magic Helpers

volume.name: Roy Rogers e o Trigger: Suplemento ao Mundo de Aventuras

description: Season 1 of the hit webcomic is collected for you here and chronicles the story of Darren Palmer, a twenty-something con man who is killed in a freak accident, and given a second chance at redemption by serving as a "Spectromancer". His task is to hunt down and return the rogue spirits who've escaped limbo's judgement. However, Darren is all about personal gain, and instead begins to exploit his powers for profit.

As the daughter and sidekick to Battle Jack, Jacqueline Mackenzie's life couldn't be any better, but tragedy is just around the corner… Will she be ready to protect Foxbay from the likes of Dr. Chimera and his army AniMen or The Recycler and the junkbots? Will her new super gorilla sidekick be more than she can handle? Will Aero-Girl still be the hero she (and her father) always dreamed she would be?

Note: The digital edition (8/26/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: Vol. 1

description: A one shot comic tracing the relationship between two shapeshifters, devoid of inherent identity.

Godfred Vejdeking

Graphic tale about the early, heathen Viking Age. Berserker starts with the attack on the Lindisfarne Monastery in 793 and is depicting the initiation of the warrior Saxnot as a Berserker. He goes into the service of Godfred, king of the danes, together with his brother Odinkar.
name: Alex and Jamie

description: Two, four, six, eight! Who makes cheers that are so great? BETTY AND VERONICA! Flip out with the Riverdale cheerleading squad in this digital-only collection. Cheerleading isn't just for moral support -- it's a sport of its own! So grab your pom-poms and hop onto the human pyramid, because Betty and Veronica need your help to get the crowd going!

Big Boss, as a life-long assassin, has never backed out of a contract nor failed a hit. After accepting a new contract, an aspect of his sordid past comes back to potentially put an end to his future.

With an up-and-coming assassin after his head, will Big Boss be able to save his reputation and his life? Or has time run out for the man known as the Big Boss?
name: Vol. 1

description:
Ides of March

When Doctor Seitsan presents the Black Suit of Death (B.S.D.), a killing machine, as the solution to control the rampaging overpopulation on the planet Utopia IX, he is declared a traitor and banished to the one planet in the galaxy sick enough for his deranged appetite of destruction: EARTH!

volume.name: The Black Suit of Death: Ides of March

description:
The water came and the cities fell. They were alone.

The world is covered with water, Charlie is restricted to his boat searching for a home he may never find. Plagued by memories, nightmares and the shadows will he be able to survive in this new world and find peace?
name: Volume 01

description:
Young People for the Leader

The toxic atmosphere on Earth forced humanity to migrate to the Moon back in 2325. There, a Moon Leader rules with the dream of a lunar utopia and a mission to erase all living memory of life on Earth.

But for an 11 year old girl named Couri Vine, life on the moon is no utopia. Ridiculed as a freak by her classmates, Couri was born with a life threatening lung disability and has to wear an embarrassing helmet that provides an artificial atmosphere.

When her grandfather, a scientist who is hiding out as a senile old man, gets taken prisoner, Couri resolves to rescue him. What she discovers is that she alone has the power to uncover the truth of what happened on Earth ...and what happened to her.
name: Young People for the Leader

description: Grammy-nominated British metallers Cradle of Filth have finally crossed the murky and treacherous depths between music and comics--a feat oft attempted, but rarely achieved with the power, elegance, and literary fire of The Curse of Venus Aversa. This winter, the long awaited Cradle of Filth graphic novel will escape from the printer into the ether. Based on a story by Dani Filth and New Orleans comic book author Kurt Amacker (Dead Souls, The 69 Eyes: Helsinki Vampires), the tale drags readers back to the cold, dark days of Victorian England. After the murder of his lover Gabrielle, the salacious poet Lord Daniel Impudicus faces down authorities, hoards of vampires, an ancient goddess, and his own demons. This very graphic novel features stunning black and white art by Monty Borror and a seductive limited edition cover by Jamie Huntley.
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: Cradle of Filth: The Curse of Venus Aversa

description: The identity behind the anonymous person who had donated an incredible sum to the medical facility where Genma worked was none other than a desert sheikh with a prestigious name. Just when he makes his appearance, he tells her that he would like her to quit this facility and come back to his homeland with him. He takes her to his kingdom, which is surrounded by golden sand and the beautiful blue sea, and decorated with roses. Genma realizes that he brought her here because of her medical talents, but she can't help but feel an attraction to him. This will not work out... We are too different...
name: Vol. 1

description: Dubai, 20XX. An elite team of high-tech mercenaries shadows young cybernetics researcher Lawrence Dodd as he makes his way to the 11th annual Dubai Conference of the Arts and Sciences. For first-time team leader Grasshead, this sort of protection gig should be a real millkrun, but outside forces conspire to make it anything but. Who is watching whom, and who really needs protecting?

The Calm Before the Storm

When an alien ship crash lands on Earth, scientist Karen Matthews is brought in to study the vessel. Unfortunately for her and the Earth, the vessel is just a prelude to an even greater danger that threatens all life on Earth, an all-out invasion from an alien race.

Elswhere, Luis Lopez is returning home after years in the Air Force. But somehow, Luis mysteriously knows all about the impending alien invasion.
name: The Calm Before the Storm

description:
Ensnared by the Dark Tunnel on a seemingly endless journey through space and time, the first God Atum, adventurer and test pilot Steve-Steph Alexander and the Silver Knight turned foredoomed Barghest travel from realm to realm hoping the next will break the curse and return them home. In this debut issue the Dark Tunnel drops our trio in the middle of an evil plot to transform the world’s population into a mindless horde under the control of the King of the Living Dead. Also, there may be a connection to the trio’s circumstances and what lies in the cavern of death.

Drawing on new ideas and new characters as well as public domain, Freaks and Gods is a unique blend of horror, sci-fi and adventure that you will not soon forget.
name: Breadcrumbs In the Cavern of Death

description: Adaptation of the record "Headless Over Heels"
name: Born To Lose

description:
Born To Lose

In a future where humans are extinct, one was bred in a lab to be a living biological weapon.

Not all is what it seems when a gay teenager commits a gruesome and shocking suicide in front of his horrified family. The mystery deepens as his boyfriend, Jason makes his way through a robot-zombie apocalypse to find out the truth about why his boyfriend died.

Ignition

Nerdy teenager, Cameron Simms, copes with his newfound abilities in a world where champions are all but forgotten.
name: Ignition

description: Being torn apart from his first love, Alex, a housekeeper's son, fell in love with his boss's daughter, Rebecca. Because of that, he and his whole family felt her father's wrath when they were fired. To protect his family and his younger sister, who was still only a child, he did whatever it took and became rather successful. He now had a mansion that rivaled Rebecca's father's. However, no matter how rich he got, he couldn't forget the shame and powerlessness he felt that day. Now a cruel millionaire himself, he comes face-to-face again with Rebecca to get his revenge...
name: Vol. 1

description: When a workaholic superhero returns to his home town to carry out an important mission, he unexpectedly runs into the woman he once loved. Now he has to choose between abandoning his heroic duty, or his chance to win her back.

Enter the Tiger

Meet Art Marshall; a down-and-out, professional karaoke singer who one day discover that he has the ability to project his voice as a weapon. He is discovered by the 500 year old Master Pembo who teaches him the ways of martial arts. Join Art Marshall as he fulfills his life-long dream of becoming a hero!
name: Enter the Tiger

description:
This collection reprints the first four issues of Phase 7 in their entirety:

#001 features a twelve-page "silent" comic about escaping horrible office jobs, plus a variety of one and two-page comics with plenty of gags and jokes!

#002 has three short stories: a trip to New York City with my friend Gabe, working as a scenic carpenter in L.A. and tree-hugging SPACE ALIENS!

#003 is the epic story of my cross-country road trip with my friend Gabe. Drawn with stick figures in a journal-type Comics form. Adventure! Love! Hilarity! Danger! Gambling!

#004 contains a semi-autobiographical tale that explores the idea of graffiti as art. I used all real graffiti from the streets of Seattle, WA.

This book also features an all-new three page introduction and Phase 7 covers, introductions and letter columns.
name: Vol. 1

description: In the desert country of Zulan, Katrina, a visiting natural sciences researcher, is mesmerized by a man she meets one day in the marketplace. His eyes shine a brilliant amber, and he exudes the strength of one who lives in the desert. Chased by armed soldiers, he approaches Katrina, and pretending to be lovers so that he may make his escape, leaves her with a passionate kiss. Even though it was just an act, why does her heart beat so anxiously?
name: Sheikh's Arabian Night 3

description: Follow along as best buddies Roy and Shane take turns forming one semi-autobiographical look into their sad little lives. This book collects the first year (over one-hundred strips!) of the twice-weekly webcomic. Share in the jubilation, the heartbreak, the violence, and the dick and fart jokes all over again or for the very first time!
name: Year One

description: Dracula tries to take the North from Santa in an all out battle between naughty and nice.
Packed with 130 pages of wickedly funny comics, this book is perfect for both new readers and longtime fans of the webcomic SCAPULA!

On a quiet July night in Chicago, 19-year-old Michael Riggs witnesses the murder of his best friend at the hand of notorious gang leader, Robert Torres. Michael becomes obsessed and nothing can stop him on his vicious and bloody rampage of vigilante justice.

Lured by a sweetly beautiful piano melody, Prince Shahir meets a beautiful lady. But, once the figure at the piano notices him, she runs out as if trying to escape from him... "Just who was that woman in my castle?" He finds the answer soon. Her name is Kirsten, and she is one of the castle custodians. He is the crown prince of a kingdom, and has no intention of something as foolish as laying a hand on an employee. However, he can't believe a woman so beautiful is a custodian... Could there be some sort of reason? And the prince playfully gets close to Kirsten?!
name: Vol. 1
